response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication to excellence. We are offering this remarkable piece at an exclusive price of $750,000, believing it represents a fantastic opportunity for someone like you who appreciates quality and exclusivity. Please let us know if you would like to explore this further or have any questions about its features and benefits. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional product with you.", "product_price": 750000}
